label: Telegram to Reginald Barrett from Isaiah Bennett

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
MIN NL PDB SPECIAL CHARGE
REGINALD BARRETT
116 CONGRESS ST HEW
CHARLESTON S.C.

NATIONAL ORGANIZING COMMITTEE
OF HOSPITAL WORKERS
655 EAST BAY ST

DEAR MR. BARRETT:

AS A RESULT OF OUR RECENT CONVERSATION, I AM SENDING YOU THIS MESSAGE.
ON BEHALF OF THE WORKERS AT THE MEDICAL COLLEGE OF
SOUTH CAROLINA AT CHARLESTON, I REQUEST A COMPLETE INVESTIGATION
OF THE SITUATION, SO THAT THE ISSUES OF DISCRIMINATION AND POVERTY
WAGES CAN BE EXAMINED AND CHANGED. I AM HOPEFUL THAT HEW [U.S. Department of Health, Education and Welfare] WILL
BE ABLE TO INVESTIGATE THE MEDICAL COLLEGE. I ALSO REQUEST
A MEETING BETWEEN THE HOSPITAL ADMINISTRATION, THE COMMITTEE
OF THE WORKERS, AND THEIR ELECTED REPRESENTATIVE.
SINCERELY
ORGANIZER OF HOSPITAL
WORKERS IN S.C.
